disp-quote.p: I'm afraid. It's [AIDS] a deadly disease… that is what I am scared of. I'm sure many people are also afraid to get an HIV test because of it. (cs28, Non Balinese, non brothel-based sex worker‘s client)
Actually I once invited him to do a test, but he said no. He said he’s better not knowing his status, even though he might die suddenly. (yk7, Balinese, brothel-based sex worker‘s client)
All I know is that the disease cannot be cured; probably will die right away. (yk9, Non Balinese, brothel-based sex worker‘s client)
